name: Lemon Herb Chicken & Vegetables
description: Chicken marinated with fresh herbs and lemon, baked with seasonal vegetables. Healthy and delicious.

instructions.instruction: Make marinade: Mix lemon juice, 2 tbsp olive oil, minced garlic, dried oregano, salt, and pepper.
Coat chicken breast in marinade thoroughly.
instructions.tip: Marinate for at least 15 minutes, overnight is best.

instructions.instruction: Spread zucchini, eggplant, tomatoes, and onion on a large baking sheet.
Drizzle remaining olive oil over vegetables, season with salt and pepper. Toss to coat.
Place marinated chicken on top of vegetables.
Arrange lemon slices and fresh herbs on top of chicken.
instructions.tip: Lemon slices can be used decoratively when serving.

instructions.instruction: Roast for 35-40 minutes. Internal temp should reach 74째C (165째F).
During cooking, spoon pan juices over chicken and vegetables.
instructions.tip: Do this at 15 and 25 minute marks.

instructions.instruction: Remove from oven, rest 5 minutes, and serve.

tips: Vegetables can be swapped based on season.
Dried herbs can replace fresh (use half the amount).
storageInfo: Refrigerate in sealed container for 3-4 days.
servingSuggestion: Serve with brown rice or bulgur pilaf.
variations: Add artichoke hearts for extra vegetables.
Add olives and capers for Mediterranean flavor.
Fish can be prepared the same way.
